/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street, lined with buildings and trees, stretches out into the distance, creating a sense of depth and perspective. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise up against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. A few red and green accents add a splash of color to the otherwise monochrome palette. The sun shines brightly in the top right corner of the image, casting a warm glow over the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives the viewer a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle.
